root: ^I've been counting the days since the drone last gave its lovely signal.
^Perhaps it was always fated to be like this.
^A constant reminder of the vast distance between us. Regardless of whether or not you return, it is tortuous to be without you.
^But I'll be strong for you and the child.
^I won't forget the tender moments, the passion, or the mistakes we've made along our way together.
^Even the pain serves as a reminder of how deeply I love you.
